results.title: Jesse Kriel honoured to take up Springbok captaincy for BaaBaas tussle
results.description: Jesse Kriel will lead the Springboks against the BaaBaas in the injury enforced absence of regular captain Siya Kolisi on Saturday.

results.title: Zimbabwean national sentenced to 50 years in jail for kidnapping
results.description: Nxinxi Tshabalala appeared in the Booysens Magistrates' Court where the sentence was handed down.

results.title: Contraband seized in Thohoyandou prison raid
results.description: Authorities seize drugs, cellphones, and electronics during raid at Matatshe Correctional Centre.
